algorithm

Class Search<T extends Node>

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.Search<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The node subclass you want to work with.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlindSearch

    public abstract class Search<T extends Node>
extends java.lang.Object
    To use this class, first setup a Search instance, then perform the desired search algorithm. Once the search is concluded, getPath() will return the found path.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Stijn Hoskens
